definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture

sentences.english: When he was not at the firm, Obama was teaching at the University of Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 他不在事务所的时候，就会去芝加哥大学讲课。

sentences.english: Shelly Kagan The guy last time thought he was Shelly Kagan, believed he was professor of philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 上次讲课的家伙认为他是，相信他是哲学教授。

sentences.english: There's, roughly speaking, two ways to do a class, especially an introductory class like this.
sentences.chinese: 简单的说，讲课有两种方法，特别是像这种引论课。

sentences.english: I had also kept up with my teaching schedule.
sentences.chinese: 我还一直坚持按照教学计划讲课。

sentences.english: I deliver lectures here at the university before a large audience.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，我在大学面对广大听众讲课。

sentences.english: He delivered lectures on the Hibbert foundation at Manchester College.
sentences.chinese: 他领取希伯特基金会提供的酬金在曼彻斯特学院讲课。

sentences.english: Surely, I gave lectures and tried to work hard for UIBE.
sentences.chinese: 我曾在这里努力工作，教书讲课。

sentences.english: She organizes her lectures well and appeals to the students.
sentences.chinese: 她讲课有条不紊，深受学生欢迎。

sentences.english: Don't digress from the subject when lecturing.
sentences.chinese: 讲课时不要扯到枝节上。

sentences.english: She actually has a couple of opportunities, both in lecturing at local colleges.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，她有两个机会，都是在大学里讲课。

sentences.english: Monica was very attentive to her teacher in class.
sentences.chinese: 蒙妮卡上课时非常专心的听老师讲课。

sentences.english: In his lecture the teacher expanded on the uses of the English subjunctive mood.
sentences.chinese: 老师在讲课中详细地讲述了英语虚拟语气的用法。

sentences.english: The students have benefited a lot from his lectures.
sentences.chinese: 学生们从他的讲课中受益非浅。

sentences.english: Professor Cheng is giving a lecture.
The students benefited a lot from his lecture.
sentences.chinese: 学生们从他的讲课中受益非浅。

sentences.english: So, let me jump straight to it.

definition: to attend a class/to go to a lecture
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
to attend a lecture/to listen to a talk
to begin a lecture/to start on a story
to write on the blackboard/writing on the blackboard
